template <typename LView, typename RView>
struct vsip::impl::View_promotion
File: ../../../vsip/core/expr/binary_operators.hpp

View_promotion allows the compiler to instantiate binary operators for views that differ in their constness only. A 'type' member is only provided in the special case where the two view template parameters are identical, and thus template parameter substitution will fail in general. This ('SFINAE') principle makes the compiler consider the binary operator template only for matching view types.

Specializations:
View_promotion<View,View>
